n = int(input())
arr = list(map(int, input().split()))

if n == 1:
    print(0)
    exit()

arr.sort()

if arr[0] == arr[-1]:
    print(0)
    exit()

if arr[0] == arr[-2] or arr[1] == arr[-1]:
    print(arr[-1] - arr[0])
    exit()

print(-1)

def main():
    # input
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    # find the minimum and maximum number
    min_num = min(a)
    max_num = max(a)
    # check if the difference is even
    if (max_num - min_num) % 2 == 0:
        print((max_num - min_num) // 2)
    else:
        print((max_num - min_num + 1) // 2)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
